title: faucetsoft.com

created_time: November 23, 2022, 06:36:08 PMLast edit: December 12, 2023, 12:01:52 AM by faucetsoft.com
content: Faucetsoft.com develops innovative Crypto Faucet Software Products for Free to Play, Free to Earn cryptocurrency gaming projects and more. Our products can be integrated quickly and efficiently.https://faucetsoft.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/faucetsoft-infos.pngThe main Bitcoin Faucet and Cryptocurrency Faucet software products can be delivered in various formats and combinations. These packages are complemented with additional features and functionality, monetization options and anti-fraud security systems.Create your Crypto FaucetWe give you the opportunity to create your own Bitcoin Faucet in a matter of minutes. You will not create an ordinary faucet, you will create the best and most powerful faucet. You will get all the features you need to run a good Bitcoin Faucet business.Crypto Faucet Software is the new solution to create your Cryptocurrency Faucet that offers amazing features and functionalities.FeaturesSecured Funds.Multiple Fraud verifications.Full customizable content.Instant Withdraw.Jackpot System.All Languages.Provably Fair.Staking System.API Integration.Innovative Code.Special FeaturesItem Shop: Items offer bonuses and benefits in games.Games: Cryptocurrency games developed with HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.Monetization: Professional monetization system with popups and banner spaces.Membership: VIP Membership System with benefits and bonuses.Admin Panel FeaturesFull Management: Get a complete management of your Crypto Faucet administration, edit the configuration and parameters of the site, set the name of the site, the currency with which it will work, add their respective API keys, withdrawal commissions and security parameters.Full Statistics: With our statistics system you will be able to have a complete accounting of the actions of each user such as purchase of bonuses, number of plays, deposits and withdrawals.Full Control: Have full control of your Crypto Faucet, edit user accounts, suspend and delete, approve and cancel transactions at your preference, set game rewards according to your preferences and those of your users. Successfully add the Ads codes.https://imgiu.com/4brFx22qyE/google-adsense.jpgContact us for a demo: https://faucetsoft.com/contact

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: I did not find a price for this script or licensing conditions. so the price is only on request? Also, demo only on request?Is the faucet script at least a little faster than your site, where a loading icon appears for every page?Is there a possibility of integration into WordPress?

comments.author: faucetsoft.com
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on November 23, 2022, 09:17:35 PMI did not find a price for this script or licensing conditions. so the price is only on request? Also, demo only on request?Is the faucet script at least a little faster than your site, where a loading icon appears for every page?Is there a possibility of integration into WordPress?Hello, thanks for your interest, indeed the costs are on request as well as the live demos. Contact our support team: https://faucetsoft.com/contact and our agents will assist you to provide the necessary information.Faucetsoft Team.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: bnbstorm on January 25, 2023, 02:28:56 PMThere are hundreds of faucet maker in market now. How is your faucet better? Also for games in faucet is there any probably fair mechanism for users to verify? I asked for a demo and price request. It's an understatement to say that I'm surprised.besides everything, I still didn't get the opportunity to try the demo as an admin, only as the end user of the faucet.  Also, there are two versions/packages. Not sure why is that so, because each add-on is charged separately.I will not state the price publicly, considering that the owner also keeps it a secret. To the OP, are you actually looking for one customer for a complete license?I tried to register as an end user, however, in order to complete the registration, I need to click on the activation link from the email within 60 seconds. That email never arrived.

Hello, thank you for your interest in our Product, as you can see we offer a highly professional solution aimed at a sustainable and self-sustaining business in a legitimate and legal way. We offer a direct orientation to the game mechanisms based on the greats of the industry, considering that they are unique games not contemplated by any faucet software currently.Not to mention all the additional functionalities that our proposal has, we invite you to see and analyze the Product a little more closely so that you have a clearer vision.Quote from: examplens on January 25, 2023, 03:46:59 PMQuote from: bnbstorm on January 25, 2023, 02:28:56 PMThere are hundreds of faucet maker in market now. That email never arrived.Regarding your opinion, we are sorry that you have felt offended if that is what we can understand, as you will see, it is a quality product designed and worked on by professionals considering the characteristics and functionalities that are not at all accessible in the market. More, however, as you mention, we offer various modalities and versions considering that they are characteristic of all developer companies, you are not even obliged to make high outlays for the implementation of your project.Regarding the demo, we never received a response from you requesting access to the administration panel, however thank you for keeping the right reserved on the cost, as you will also see because we offer various options, we cannot offer a direct cost without be a choice of our customers.FaucetSoft Team.

comments.author: bnbstorm
comments.body: Quoteas you can see we offer a highly professional solution aimed at a sustainable and self-sustaining business in a legitimate and legal way. We offer a direct orientation to the game mechanisms based on the greats of the industry, considering that they are unique games not contemplated by any faucet software currently.I cannot see how you offer professional solution which is sustainable as I am unable to view demo of your work. I have already purchased a faucet script from a guy. It was expensive and not working. We cannot contact on services like Telegram where seller can delete whole chat and leave buyer in despair. . So for your buyers interest make a demo available with price and functionality listed and try to discuss as much as possible on this public forum. This type of interaction will increase interest in your service also will provide buyer a confidence that they will get what they will pay for. This is how you can get some customers. Otherwise I don't think people will contact you for buying.
